info.description: This is a sample Inventory management server.
info.title: Inventory API

put.description: Update a product category by ID

delete.description: Delete a product category by ID

get.description: Get all inventory items with pagination, search, and sort
Get an inventory item by ID

put.description: Update an inventory item by ID

delete.description: Delete an inventory item by ID

post.description: Login with username and password to get JWT token

get.description: Get all purchase orders with pagination, search, and sort

delete.description: Delete a purchase order by ID

put.description: Update status (e.g., Pending -> Received). Updates inventory if Received.

post.description: Assign a list of permissions to a role
Assign a role to a user
Register a new user with username and password

get.description: Get counts of items, warehouses, users, suppliers, and low stock items
Get all suppliers with pagination, search, and sort
Get all warehouses with pagination, search, and sort

valid.description: Valid is true if Time is not NULL
